items.value: Michael got lost at the Center!

Nice to see you again my friend!
These guys who run here are really aggro!
I need something to heal and Donuts to bribe the bad boys.

Michael need:
1x First Aid
1x Crutch
5x Donut

then maybe I can finally get out of here and build my hiding place!
i have the Medical Stuff with me, take it!
i will come back as fast as possible!

Thank you very much!
Now I can bribe the boys and maybe continue building undisturbed at my hiding place. Do you already have a good bed?

Michael give you:
1x Simple Bed (boxed)
2x filled Wallet

I hope we'll see each other again soon!

Sorry but I need these things!
I can't continue without these things.

Come back when you have them ..
